name: Chaotic Cat
description:
Chqiui the cat is angry. Because she was left alone again and again in different places. So she starts to make a mess. More mess, more satisfaction for the cats mood! Help her to express her emotions and make the biggest mess you can!

Optimized for Controller or Keyboard!

awsd: Movement

Space or Enter: Jump

Press Q when walking: RUN.

Press E: Grab/Push stuff

Left and Right: Camera rotation

Mouse during Play: Buttons for Actions, Left/Right for Rotation (suboptimal in this versions)

Escape OR Backspace: Pause Menu

Hint for the tutorial: Move the tables when running to reach faster the ***stars. You need 2 and a Player name to get in the leaderboard!

Turn on the Music and the Sound FX in the Options!

For the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 there are 5 different levels to explore. The Web Version have only 4, the factory was to big to upload and is only in the download Version.

The global leaderboard works only at the download version with an internet connection.

Gameplay Video:

Can you get the 3 stars in every level? Can you beat the actual global cat leader?

Feel free to give feedback & support my project, thank you very much!

Known bug: When you end a level the canvas menu stuck if you click on it by mouse. Please use keyboard or controller for this menu and not the mouse! Many hours went into UI fixing. 

Camera: Not turning into walls is on my todo list. Use the camera carefully, better with the right/left keys or the controller.

After the votingperiod for the gamejam I update the game with fixed bugs and several surprises.
